typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as string,
		VendorID as string,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		InvoiceTotal as string,
		PaymentTotal as string,
		CreditTotal as string,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		PaymentDate as date 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadInvoices
ReadInvoices alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> MarkUpsert
MarkUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['InvoiceID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteInvoiceData
